text: mariyu (jnapakam cesukondi) a rendu paksalalo, oka paksam mi cetiki tappaka cikkutundani allah mito vagdanam cesinappudu; ayudhalu leni paksam miku dorakalani miru korutu unnaru. Kani allah tanu iccina mata prakaram satyanni satyanga nirupincalani mariyu avisvasulanu samulanga nasanam ceyalani koradu
